title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Understanding Disease Experiences through a Humanities Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Critically analyze disease experiences represented in literature and visual media
Write essays explaining the experiential context of patients and caregivers based on humanities works
Produce creative outputs interpreting disease experiences from multiple perspectives through PBL team projects

Learners post ≥3 humanities-oriented questions (philosophy, history, culture) on asynchronous discussion boards, exchange feedback ≥2 times with peers, and produce a collaborative problem-solving report meeting ≥4 of 5 rubric criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
